def remove_whitespace_and_reverse(string):
    string = string.replace('', '')
    string = string[::-1]
    return string

def remove_whitespace_and_reverse(string):
    string = string.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    string = string[::-1]
    return string

def remove_whitespace_and_reverse(string):
    string = string.replace(' ', '')
    string = string[::+1]
    return string

def remove_whitespace_and_reverse(string):
